titles.en: THE BOOK OF BELIEF (Emān) AND DISBELIEF (KUFR)

titles.ar: بَابُ مَنِ اسْتَعَانَ بِهِ أَخُوهُ فَلَمْ يُعِنْهُ
titles.en: Chapter 156 – The one whose assistance is sought by his brother but he does not assist him

titles.ar: بَابُ مَنِ اسْتَعَانَ بِهِ أَخُوهُ فَلَمْ يُعِنْهُ
titles.en: Chapter 156 – The one whose assistance is sought by his brother but he does not assist him

verses.text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ خَالِدٍ وَ أَبُو عَلِيٍّ الْأَشْعَرِيُّ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ حَسَّانَ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عَلِيٍّ عَنْ سَعْدَانَ عَنْ حُسَيْنِ بْنِ أَمِينٍ عَنْ أَبِي جَعْفَرٍ ع قَالَ مَنْ بَخِلَ بِمَعُونَةِ أَخِيهِ الْمُسْلِمِ وَ الْقِيَامِ لَهُ فِي حَاجَتِهِ إِلَّا ابْتُلِيَ بِمَعُونَةِ مَنْ يَأْثَمُ عَلَيْهِ وَ لَا يُؤْجَرُ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
A number of our companions, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad Bin Khalid, and Abu Ali Al Ashary, from Muhammad Bin Hassan, from Muhammad Bin Ali, from Sa’dan, from Husayn Bin Ameen, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘The one who is resentful of helping his Muslim brother and the standing for him regarding his need except that he would be Tried with assisting upon one who sins and he would not be Recompensed (for assisting him)’.

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنْ يُونُسَ عَنِ ابْنِ مُسْكَانَ عَنْ أَبِي بَصِيرٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ أَيُّمَا رَجُلٍ مِنْ شِيعَتِنَا أَتَى رَجُلًا مِنْ إِخْوَانِهِ فَاسْتَعَانَ بِهِ فِي حَاجَتِهِ فَلَمْ يُعِنْهُ وَ هُوَ يَقْدِرُ إِلَّا ابْتَلَاهُ اللَّهُ بِأَنْ يَقْضِيَ حَوَائِجَ غَيْرِهِ مِنْ أَعْدَائِنَا يُعَذِّبُهُ اللَّهُ عَلَيْهَا يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Ali Bin Ibrahim, from Muhammad Bin Isa, from Yunus, from Ibn Muskan, from Abu Baseer, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘Whichever man from our<sup>asws</sup> Shias goes over to a man from his brethren to be assisted by him regarding his need but he does not assist him while he is able, except that Allah<sup>azwj</sup> will Try him with him fulfilling the needs of other from our<sup>asws</sup> enemies, and Allah<sup>azwj</sup> would Punish him upon it on the Day of Judgment’.

verses.text: أَبُو عَلِيٍّ الْأَشْعَرِيُّ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ حَسَّانَ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ أَسْلَمَ عَنِ الْخَطَّابِ بْنِ مُصْعَبٍ عَنْ سَدِيرٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ لَمْ يَدَعْ رَجُلٌ مَعُونَةَ أَخِيهِ الْمُسْلِمِ حَتَّى يَسْعَى فِيهَا وَ يُوَاسِيَهُ إِلَّا ابْتُلِيَ بِمَعُونَةِ مَنْ يَأْثَمُ وَ لَا يُؤْجَرُ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Abu Ali Al Ashary, from Muhammad Bin Hassan, from Muhammad Bin Aslam, from Al Khattab Bin Mus’ab, from Sadeyr, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘A man would not leave assisting his Muslim brother until he strives regarding it and consoling him except that he would be Tried with assisting one who sins and he would not be Recompensed (for assisting him)’.

verses.text: الْحُسَيْنُ بْنُ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ مُعَلَّى بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ عَنْ عَلِيِّ بْنِ جَعْفَرٍ عَنْ أَخِيهِ أَبِي الْحَسَنِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ سَمِعْتُهُ يَقُولُ مَنْ قَصَدَ إِلَيْهِ رَجُلٌ مِنْ إِخْوَانِهِ مُسْتَجِيراً بِهِ فِي بَعْضِ أَحْوَالِهِ فَلَمْ يُجِرْهُ بَعْدَ أَنْ يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ فَقَدْ قَطَعَ وَلَايَةَ اللَّهِ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Al Husayn Bin Muhammad, from Moalla Bin Muhammad, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad Bin Abdullah, 
(It has been narrated) from Ali<sup>as</sup> son Ja’far<sup>asws</sup>, from his brother<sup>asws</sup> Musa<sup>asws</sup>, said, ‘I heard him<sup>asws</sup> saying: ‘The one to whom a man from his brethren intends to seek his help during one of his states, but he does not help him after being able upon it, so he has cut off the Wilayah of Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Mighty and Majestic’.
